articles.description: Guillem Balague examines the problems that have led Manchester City and Real Madrid to meet in the Champions League play-off.
articles.title: Champions League: Man City & Real Madrid fighting for their lives

articles.description: President Trump and Taylor Swift in attendance as Philadelphia Eagles beat Kansas City Chiefs in Super Bowl 59 at Caesars Superdrome, New Orleans
articles.title: Super Bowl 59: President Trump, Taylor Swift watch Philadelphia Eagles beat Kansas City Chiefs

articles.description: There was a sense it was over almost before it began as Scotland suffer another chastening Six Nations defeat by Ireland, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: Ireland live rent free in Scotland heads again

articles.description: With golf back live on free-to-air television in the UK, the leader of the free world brokering a united future and top stars growing the game on a giant simulator, should we be looking at the sport from a glass half full perspective, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Boom or bust? PGA Tour, DP World Tour and LIV Golf in flux but is it really thriving?

articles.description: The Philadelphia Eagles demolish the Kansas City Chiefs to win 40-22 and deny them an unprecedented third straight Super Bowl win.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2025: Philadelphia Eagles demolish Kansas City Chiefs 40-22 to win NFL title

articles.description: England "find a way" to beat France and Ireland keep their Grand Slam hopes alive - the talking points from round two of the Six Nations.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: England, Ireland & Italy win - round two talking points

articles.description: The leading LIV Golf League player not already exempt for this year's Open Championship will gain entry to the field for Royal Portrush.
articles.title: The Open give place to LIV Golf player for Royal Portrush

articles.description: Liverpool boss Arne Slot learns you cannot mess with the FA Cup after an embarrassing defeat at Plymouth, writes chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Plymouth Argyle 1-0 Liverpool: Arne Slot gets harsh FA Cup lesson in shock defeat

articles.description: Monza reappoint Alessandro Nesta as their manager seven weeks after sacking the former Italy defender.
articles.title: Monza appoint Alessandro Nesta seven weeks after sacking him

articles.description: BBC Sport's Nesta McGregor speaks to Philadelphia Eagles head coach Nick Sirriani, cornerback Cooper DeJean and offensive tackle Jordan Mailata as they celebrate their Super Bowl win over the Kansas City Chiefs in New Orleans.
articles.title: Super Bowl 59: Philadelphia Eagles celebrate Super Bowl win in locker room
